abstract: Editorial supports City Council bill to impose deadlines on New York City Landmarks Preservation Commission to keep properties from waiting so long for decisions; holds commission's nearly 100 backlog properties have been awaiting votes on their status for far too long, with some languishing for even 50, years.
lead_paragraph: The Landmarks Preservation Commission seems to have a particular problem with making timely decisions.

headline.main: Speed Up New York’s Landmarks Process

snippet: The Landmarks Preservation Commission seems to have a particular problem with making timely decisions.
